statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT route_id,date,average_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High';
SELECT id, route_id, weather_conditions FROM traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'Low' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE average_speed > 60 ORDER BY congestion_level ASC, date ASC;
SELECT id, route_id, date, congestion_level, average_speed, weather_conditions FROM traffic_data WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, average_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'high' ORDER BY average_speed DESC
SELECT route_id, congestion_level, weather_conditions FROM traffic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31'
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE average_speed > 60 AND weather_conditions IN ('rainy', 'snowy') ORDER BY average_speed ASC
SELECT id, congestion_level, weather_conditions FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level != 'low' AND congestion_level != 'medium' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT date, traffic_intensity FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT starting_point, destination, distance FROM route_info WHERE average_speed > 60;
SELECT id, route_id, traffic_intensity FROM traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-12-01' AND congestion_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM route_info WHERE distance < 100 OR average_speed < 50 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT route_id, congestion_level FROM traffic_data INNER JOIN route_info ON traffic_data.route_id = route_info.route_id WHERE route_info.starting_point = 'City A' AND route_info.destination = 'City B'
SELECT route_id, date, traffic_intensity FROM traffic_data WHERE route_id = 5 AND traffic_intensity > 50 ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT starting_point, destination, AVG(traffic_intensity) AS avg_traffic_intensity FROM route_info INNER JOIN traffic_data ON route_info.route_id = traffic_data.route_id GROUP BY starting_point, destination
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-30' ORDER BY route_id, date
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_status = 'Heavy';
SELECT route_name, traffic_density FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY traffic_density DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, timestamp FROM traffic_patterns WHERE route_name LIKE '%Highway%';
SELECT route_name, congestion_level, congestion_start, congestion_end FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, recommended_speed, recommended_route FROM route_planning;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT id, route_name, traffic_density FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_status = 'Heavy';
SELECT route_name, traffic_status, timestamp FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_density > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT congestion_level, congestion_start, congestion_end FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High' AND congestion_end > NOW();
SELECT route_name, recommended_speed, recommended_route FROM route_planning WHERE recommended_speed >= 60 ORDER BY recommended_speed ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns;
SELECT route_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficPatterns ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT traffic_date FROM TrafficPatterns;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM RouteDetails WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT location, incident_type, incident_date FROM TrafficIncidents ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns;
SELECT route_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE traffic_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM RouteDetails ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT id, traffic_date, congestion_level FROM DailyCongestion WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY traffic_date ASC;
SELECT location, incident_type, incident_date FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM Route LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM TrafficEvent WHERE event_type = 'accident';
SELECT route_id, congestion_level, event_timestamp FROM HistoricalData ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT weather_condition FROM Weather;
SELECT route_id, congestion_description FROM CongestionLevel WHERE congestion_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM Route;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM Route WHERE distance > 50;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance, traffic_congestion_level FROM Route ORDER BY traffic_congestion_level DESC;
SELECT r.start_location, r.end_location, t.event_type, t.event_description FROM Route r INNER JOIN TrafficEvent t ON r.route_id = t.route_id;
SELECT h.route_id, h.congestion_level, h.weather_condition, w.temperature FROM HistoricalData h LEFT JOIN Weather w ON h.route_id = w.route_id;
